title: Descriptive Text
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the app has been launched
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the In-Game Alerts button
custom_expected: THEN we see "Set whether to receive in-game alerts." text on the left side of the screen

title: In-game alerts Menu
custom_preconds: Given User is viewing the Settings menu and In-game alerts are set to Off
custom_steps:
When the user Activates In-game alerts button
AND Sets the first alert to ON
And Backs out to Settings Page
custom_expected:
Then Alert settings persist after hard quit of app.
(Repeat steps for each alert for both On and Off States)

title: Alert Persistence
custom_preconds: Given: App installed (does not have to be fresh) & launched, Welcome Placard dismissed, user observing In-game alerts menu in Settings
custom_steps:
When User sets alerts as follows:
No-Hitter = ON
Cycle = OFF
In Position Extra Innings = ON
Tie in 9th = OFF
Perfect Game = ON
AND a Hard quit is performed (double tap Home button on remote and swipe app screen up) and relaunched
custom_expected:
Alert settings persist after hard quit of app

(Observe, then repeat steps 1-5 3 times (including reset of any On/Off buttons that changed) Alert settings persist after hard quit of app)
